https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/ihUFavwUTGF5CQX2udjsU3tvyDw.jpg In this short movie featuring familiar characters from Azumanga Daioh, Osaka is yet again having a strange dream of Chiyo-Chan's pigtails being posessed. As Chiyo-Chan's pigtails bounce out of the window, who knows if young Chiyo will ever be happy again. Azumanga Daioh: The Very Short Movie
